definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: maneh, mina, a weight (perh. orig. a specific part; NH id.; As. manû Dl:HWB 417; Aram. manho0, [[מַנְיׇא]]);—´[[מ]] Ez Eze 45:12; [[מָנִים]] 1Ki 10:17 + 3 t.; = 50 shekels Ez Eze 45:12 (on [[חֲמִשִּׁים]] for [[חֲמִשָּׁה]] v. Hi Co); of gold 1Ki 10:17; of silver Ezr 2:69, Ne 7:71, Ne 7:72.—The weight of the mina was 1/60 of talent; i.e. acc. to older (Bab.) standard, 982.2 grammes (= 60 shekels at c. 16.37 g.) = c. 2 lbs.; in Ezekiel's time the mina = 50 shekels = 818.6 g. = c. 1 2/3 lb. (cf. [[כִּכָּר]], [[שֶׁקֶל]]). Vid. J. Benz:Arch. l87 ff. 194 Now:Arch. i. 208 f.
